VRStageParametersSizeY.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The sizeY read-only property of the interface returns the depth of the play-area bounds in meters.

blockquote.para: Note: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: The bounds are defined as an axis-aligned rectangle on the floor, for safety purposes. Content should not require the user to move beyond these bounds; however, it is possible for the user to ignore the bounds resulting in position values outside of this rectangle. The center of the rectangle is at (0,0,0) in standing-space coordinates.

-WebVR API homepage
- â€” demos, downloads, and other resources from the Mozilla VR team.

VRStageParametersSizeY.value: A float representing the depth in meters.
